course_description: Microbes shape the world we live in! Come research fungal microbes and their interactions with the environment. Students will propose and carry out the experiment while learning aspects of research, such as data analysis and presenting results to other scientists and to the public.
prerequisites: (BIOL 142 and BIOL 142L) or BIOL_OX 142, or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
